short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify Call for Paper submissions by avoiding continuous copy & paste, and auto-filling form from talks stored in symposiumapp.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: pronto! connects to the SymposiumApp.com API and retrieves data about your talks. It then allows you to fill in CfP form with a simple click of the button, making the submission process faster but not fully automated, allowing you to focus on the details and not on the all the copy/pasting.
